name: recycled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 having been used before and then put through a process so that it can form a new product: This newspaper is made of recycled paper.
More examplesFewer examplesThe amount of recycled glass used in manufacture doubled in five years.Offices can easily become more environmentally-friendly by, for example, using recycled paper.These organic olives are packaged in recycled glass containers.This card is printed on recycled paper .We try to use recycled cartridges wherever possible.

recycled materials or products have been treated using a special industrial process so that they can be used again: Stores and manufacturers are redesigning their packaging to include more recycled content. Authors of various reports have recommended the use of recycled water as a weapon in the fight against climate change. recycled materials/goods recycled paper/plastic/glass
